item.description:
Livin Las Vegas Show with Hot Hors D'oeuvres / Appetizers at the Sons of Italy!

For a night of fun and enjoyment check out this dynamic duo, Miami Mike Marnier and Little Eddie Chivas team up as Livin' Las Vegas. The duo re-creates the feel of a '60s lounge act, but adds hits by Billy Joel and Harry Connick Jr. to standards by Frank Sinatra and Dean Martin with much, much more!

Cost: $12.00 which includes the show, and the Hot Hors D'oeuvres.
CASH BAR Additonal

Doors open at 7:00 p.m. Show is at 8:00 p.m. That'll give us time to eat, and chat before the entertainment.

Note: I'll make the reservation after the deadline date, but each lady is responsible for their own ticket. The place is a good size and they don't think they'll sell out. You can either buy your ticket at the door or call the Sons of Italy at 508-420-3172 and pay over the phone using a credit card. If you prefer, you can pay in person on Tuesdays from 12 p.m.- 4:00 p.m. and on Thursdays after 10:00 a.m.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have on my pink hat that says, "Girl's Just Wanna Have Fun!" & a name tag!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group
